title: Minigame Champs, Patch 6.17
body:
Dear Rito games,

These "MiniGame" Champions you're releasing are just getting beyond a joke. You had everything perfect for us in Season 4 but then you ruined it by taking that away from us for this "New Meta" bullshit. Patch 6.17 is literally the WORST patch you guys have released yet, matter of fact every patch you've released since you introduced elder lizard has just gone down hill. This new Yorick update you've made almost made me quit after 5 years of playing.

STOP REWORKING THE SHIT NO ONE CARES ABOUT AND MAKE LEAGUE GOOD AGAIN, GRONKS.
